channel.title: Making Number of Players Online Show Up on Top of the Server Screen!.. help
channel.description: Does anybody know how to make the number of players online show up on top of the screen?? I rather have it in green if not its ok.. thank you!

item.title: Making Number of Players Online Show Up on Top of the Server Screen!.. help
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @red@~@whi@Z@red@e@gre@n@cya@z@whi@o@red@s@gre@c@cya@a@whi@p@red@e@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@Hello @whi@"+playerName+".", 6572); sendFrame126("@red@Owner Is@whi@"Zenzo.", 6574); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

ADD THIS UNDER

outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID); outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3)); }

Read full topic
